snippet: Mr. Trump took a break from his campaign for president to fulfill a more basic civic obligation on Monday, and brought his superlatives along.
abstract: Presidential candidate Donald Trump shows up for jury duty in Lower Manhattan but is not called for service; expresses enthusiasm, though many of his fellow New Yorkers respond to his presence with chagrin; Trump had failed to respond to five previous jury summonses.

byline.original: By JAMES C. McKINLEY Jr. and ANDY NEWMAN

lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump took a break from his campaign for president to fulfill a more basic civic obligation on Monday, and brought his superlatives along.

headline.main: Jury Duty for Donald Trump: ‘Amazing,’ ‘Really Good’ and Done in a Day
headline.print_headline: Jury Duty for Trump: ‘Amazing,’ ‘Really Good’ and Over in One Day
